name: Mimic 0.1
description:
Eat, Gather Treasure ,Survive.

More Treasure means more People.

More People means more Food.

You are Mimic 0.1.

Mimic 0.1 is a casual arcade game where you play as... well the mimic.

The concept is simple, kill enemies, mimic threats and most importantly get as many coins as you can without dying.

Well there's a little more to it.

Instructions and details can be found in the title screen by clicking on this Icon.

Credits to: Elthen's Pixel Art Shop for the character sprites https://elthen.itch.io/
